title: Initial Release
features: Progress Knight-style age progression system (12-70 years)
Skill tree with requirements and automatic resource generation
Manual resource gathering with skill-based click power
Modern UI with top bar and side navigation
gameplay: Start at age 12 with basic gathering skills
Learn new skills as you age and meet requirements
Skills automatically generate resources based on level
Rebirth when you reach your lifespan to start over
Each rebirth increases your rebirth count
technical: JSON-driven data system for easy scaling
Responsive design with CSS Grid and Flexbox
